Here are a few safe and harmless prank ideas that you can play on your friend:

1. Switch the sugar with salt in the sugar bowl. This will only work if your friend is not paying attention when they are making their coffee or tea.
2. Set your friend's alarm clock forward by a few hours. They will be very confused when they wake up in the middle of the night thinking it's time to get up.
3. Put a fake spider or other harmless creature in a place where your friend will see it and be scared.
4. Hide in a closet or other hiding spot and jump out and scare your friend when they enter the room.
5. Replace the creamer in the fridge with a similar looking container filled with something unexpected, like mustard or ketchup.

Remember, the key to a good prank is to make sure it is harmless and won't cause any real damage or distress. It's also important to consider your friend's sense of humor and make sure they will find the prank funny, rather than mean-spirited or hurtful.
